message: I understand the desire for journalists to present multiple points of view on the Thai political situation, but there are much more legitimate academics and other exiles whose opinions would be less tainted by issues of personal benefit than this guy. Please ask your journalists to interview a bit more outside the box, thanks.

He did go to the Doctor a few days ago. His plane was emergency landed so he could get medical attention. And like so wisely said...thus the prescriptions. Maybe he was misdiagnosed. Walking pneumonia perhaps? I have no clue but I wouldn't be surprised to learn it could've been prevented.

Good for Prince Harry! I'm glad the royal family is putting their power into good use. Ms. Markle is sooo beautiful! They would be lucky to have her in the family. Hope they can stick it out together! People will always find ways to be hateful, the only thing we can do is keep doing what we believe is right because to stop and give in is not going to change anything it will only make the haters happy and continue to hate. Life is meant to be lived freely, not shackled to the expectations/opinions of others. You owe it to yourself to give it your all in everything you do. Life is too short to leave it with regrets. Stay strong!

Yes, they can. If your child is in public school, he/she will pay a much higher price than it would cost you to send them to a private school. We saw it coming years ago and home schooled our two daughters. Today they have no problem with what they are. All of this is to convince people that they are normal, and you are not. I feel sorry for anyone who does not see that. Good luck.

Trump is a narcissistic buffoon who doesn't believe he has to educate or prepare himself for his job and his ignorance as he represents the US around the world makes him laughable but also scary. He is unfortunately the POTUS, but I have zero respect for him. I only hope we can survive him ... part of surviving, is making sure we speak out and most importantly show up at the voting booth to get rid of Trump and his supporters in Congress one election at a time. Next is to identify, vet and rally around an acceptable replacement for him within 3 years. Sad that he was the best that we could come up with for GOP nominee for President. This is my country, a country I love dearly, and sadly he is the President of my country. But """"my"""" president? No.
Carson will not be the next president.MR.TRUMP is the one n only that I will vote for in 2016.TRUMP FOR PRESIDENT IN 2016.
